item.title: Phone Powerâ€™s $14.95 A Month VoIP Service
item.description:
Are you thinking about switching to VoIP phone service, but put off by the high prices? That doesn’t make sense! VoIP is meant to be a cheaper alternative to traditional landlines. Don’t worry, there’s still hope. Phone Power offers a fully featured residential and home office VoIP service for only $14.95 per month. That’s more like it! Why pay $25 or $35 per month for local and long-distance calling when you can get the same or better service for $14...

item.title: What is a Cloned Phone Line?
item.description:
Phone Power’s 12-month prepaid VoIP service, already a great value with almost unlimited U.S. and Canada calling and a free second year, also includes a unique “cloned 2nd line” feature. This raises the question: is this a true second phone line, and why is it called “cloned”? Essentially, this feature provides the functionality of nearly two lines for the price of one. It utilizes the two RJ-11 jacks found on most telephone interface adapters, which connect your phone to your broadband modem or router...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/what-is-a-cloned-phone-line/
